alerts.issue_title: Critical value for RBC in Complete Blood Count
alerts.message: The 'RBC' component of the 'Complete Blood Count' test has a critical value of 2.8 10^6/uL. Reference range: 4.5-5.9.
alerts.suggested_action: Review critical lab results with a physician immediately and determine appropriate medical intervention or re-testing.

alerts.issue_title: Critical value for Platelets in Complete Blood Count
alerts.message: The 'Platelets' component of the 'Complete Blood Count' test has a critical value of 960 10^3/uL. Reference range: 150-400.
alerts.suggested_action: Review critical lab results with a physician immediately and determine appropriate medical intervention or re-testing.

alerts.issue_title: Critical value for Hemoglobin in Complete Blood Count
alerts.message: The 'Hemoglobin' component of the 'Complete Blood Count' test has a critical value of 8.2 g/dL. Reference range: 13.5-17.5.
alerts.suggested_action: Review critical lab results with a physician immediately and determine appropriate medical intervention or re-testing.

alerts.message: Required test 'Chest X-Ray' has not been completed. Status: pending.
alerts.suggested_action: Ensure 'Chest X-Ray' is completed and results are available before discharge.
